statements: DELETE FROM science_fair WHERE advisor_name = 'Professor Smith';
DELETE FROM science_fair WHERE student_id = 1 AND project_title = 'Robotics Project';
DELETE FROM science_fair WHERE advisor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND presentation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM judges WHERE judge_department = 'Engineering' AND judge_experience < 5;
DELETE FROM students WHERE school = 'Example School';
DELETE FROM comment WHERE judge_id = 2 AND project_id = 5;
DELETE FROM score WHERE score_value < 4.5 AND judge_id = 1;
DELETE FROM comments WHERE comment_date > '2022-03-15' AND commenter_id = 101;
